tagline: Your premier destination for comfortable stays and versatile event spaces in Oromia.
languagesSupported: Available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.
fillFormToBookDormitory: Fill the form below to book your preferred dormitory room.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Error fetching dormitory details. Please try again.
enterEmployer: Enter your employer or organization name
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
bookingPendingApproval: Your booking request has been received and is pending approval. We will notify you via SMS or email.
bookingDetailsBelow: Below are the details of your booking:
errorSavingBooking: There was an error saving your booking. Please try again.
selectDateRangePrompt: Select your desired date range to see available dormitories.
noDormitoriesAvailable: No dormitories are currently listed or available.
confirmDeleteDormitoryMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this dormitory? This action cannot be undone.
dormitoryIdMissing: Dormitory ID is missing from the URL.
noAvailabilityData: No availability data found for this dormitory.
pageNotFoundMessage: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist. It might have been moved or deleted.
name: Name
confirmDeleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
pleaseSelectSectionsToBook: Please select one or more sections to book.
loginAsCompanyToBook: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
fillFormToBookFacility: Complete the form below to reserve your chosen facility.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book this facility.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
fillFormToBookSelectedSections: Complete the form to book all selected sections.
anySpecialRequests: Any special requests or additional notes...
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been submitted and is pending approval.
errorSubmittingBooking: There was an error submitting your booking. Please try again.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval by our admin team.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use. Please try a different email or log in.
weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
logoutSuccessfulMessage: You have been successfully logged out.
logoutFailedMessage: There was an issue logging you out. Please try again.
dashboardDescription: Key metrics and quick insights into your operations.
viewAndManageAllBookings: View and manage all bookings in the system.
noBookingsMatchFilters: No bookings match the current filters or search term.
noBookingsFoundAdminCta: No bookings found in the system yet. Bookings will appear here once they are made.
confirmDeleteBookingMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this booking? This action cannot be undone.
registerAdminDescription: Create a new administrator account for the system.
adminRegisteredMessage: Admin account for {email} has been successfully created.
superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Super Administrators.
searchDormitories: Search by room number or floor...
noDormitoriesFoundPleaseAdd: No dormitories found. Please add new ones.
viewAndManageHallsAndSections: View and manage all halls and meeting sections.
noHallsFoundPleaseAdd: No halls or sections found. Please add new ones.
selectDateRangeForReports: Select a date range to generate reports.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Select a report type and date range, then click 'Generate Report'.
viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print periodic dormitory booking data.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a date range first.
noDataForReport: No data available for this report and selected range.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please contact support.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your facility booking request has been received and will be reviewed by our team. You will be notified of the approval status.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed.
yourBookingsDescription: View and manage your facility bookings.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyDashboard: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this page.
registrationPendingMessage: Your company registration is currently under review by our admin team. You will be notified once it's approved.
registrationRejectedMessage: We regret to inform you that your company registration has been rejected. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
statusUnknownMessage: We could not determine the status of your company account. Please contact support.
contactSupportForAssistance: Please contact support for further assistance.
errorFetchingYourBookings: Error fetching your bookings. Please try again later.
searchCompanies: Search by company name, contact, or email...
viewAndApproveCompanies: View and approve or reject company registration requests.
noCompaniesMatchSearch: No companies match your search criteria.
noCompaniesFoundAdmin: No company registrations found or awaiting approval.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Administrators or Super Administrators.
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your approved dormitory booking using your phone number.
enterPhoneNumberPrompt: Enter phone number used for booking
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings.
noBookingsFoundForPhone: No approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received. Please proceed with payment using the details below and submit proof via Telegram for approval.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: Use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the transfer, please send a screenshot or proof of payment to our Telegram Bot ({botUsername}) using the phone number: {phoneNumber} for verification.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: Our admin will verify your payment and approve your booking. You will receive a confirmation.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your payment for the dormitory booking.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking or has already been processed.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Dormitory {roomNumber} is currently set to unavailable by an administrator and cannot be booked.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompany: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to perform this action.
noSectionsSelectedOrFound: No sections were selected or item details could not be found. Please try selecting again.
errorFetchingHallsAndSections: Error fetching halls and sections list.
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a start and end date to view available dormitories for that range.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: No dormitories are available for the selected date range. Please try different dates or view all dormitories.
invalidDateRange: Invalid date range. End date cannot be before start date.
errorCheckingAvailability: An error occurred while checking availability.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: The selected dormitory's capacity is not configured correctly. Cannot proceed with booking.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: All beds in {roomName} are booked for the selected dates. Please choose different dates or another room.
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is not available for the selected dates due to a conflicting booking.
itemNotFoundDatabase: Item {itemName} not found in our records.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: {itemName} is currently set to unavailable by an administrator and cannot be booked.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used for Telegram identification if payment proof is required.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This phone number can be used for Telegram identification if payment proof is required (optional for facilities).
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory more than once for the same start date with the same phone number.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (Firestore index) is required to check for duplicate bookings. Please contact support.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: Could not check for duplicate bookings due to a missing database index. Your booking will proceed, but please ensure it's not a duplicate.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page for submitting payment proof is no longer in use. Please follow the instructions provided on the payment details page to submit proof via Telegram.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your booking is almost complete! Please ensure you've sent your payment proof via Telegram. Our team will verify it shortly.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Remember to use Booking ID: {bookingId} as your payment reference.
bankDetailsForPaymentVerification: Use these bank details for payment verification, if needed.
adminPaymentReferenceNote: Ensure payments are referenced with the Booking ID by clients.
individualUserNote: Individual users (not representing a company) can only book dormitories, not facilities.
networkRequestFailedError: Network request failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
userDataMissingError: User data could not be loaded. Please try logging out and in again, or contact support.
errorUploadingAgreementActual: There was an error uploading your signed agreement. Please try again.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement is not applicable or available for this type of booking or its current status.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter custom agreement terms here. These will replace the default terms if provided.
editTermsNote: These terms will be part of the printable agreement. Default terms will be used if this is left empty.
termsPlaceholder1: 1. The client agrees to use the facility solely for the purpose stated in the booking and not for any illegal activities.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Full payment must be made prior to the commencement of the rental period as per the invoice. Any additional services requested during the event will be billed separately.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. The client is responsible for any damages caused to the facility or equipment during the rental period and will be liable for repair or replacement costs.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Cancellation policy: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the booking date will incur a 50% charge. Cancellations made less than 48 hours prior will incur a 100% charge.
agreementNotApplicable: Agreement is not applicable for this booking.
searchDormitoryBookings: Search by guest name, phone, bank...
accessDeniedViewAgreement: Access Denied: You are not authorized to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing by the client or has already been completed.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this agreement.
failedToUploadToCloudinary: Failed to upload file to Cloudinary.
